question: ‘Ex Indradhanush’ is a defence exercise between the Air forces of India and which country?
explanation:
The Indian Air Force (IAF) and Royal Air Force (RAF) of the United Kingdom have jointly began the 5th edition of Ex Indradhanush.
The exercise is to be conducted at Hindan Air Force Station, located in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, from 24 Feb to 29 Feb 2020. The focus of this year’s exercise is \'Base Defence and Force Protection\'. The RAF team includes 36 combatants of the RAF Regiment and the IAF includes 42 combatants of the GARUD Force.
